ygData.subject: Re: Re: Banshee Aura, Restless Bones
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/13/99 1:41:54 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Yes and no.  The Town guards will not KOS you ... BUT  the Ghouls that guard the necro guild
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/13/99 1:41:54 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
lachdanan@... writes:

> As A L16 Gnome nec can I enter the home city of Dark Elves and proceed to 3d
> gate and purchase spells w/o being KOS?
Yes and no. The Town guards will not KOS you ... BUT the Ghouls that guard
the necro guild are KOS to anyone not Darkelf. but you CAN use invis to
undead to get past them.

> Also, is the book Dark Binding, the
> one used for research in Necro spells, if not what is its name?
Sounds right, but not in front of the game :)

> To get
> there I
> assume its the boat, get off at human port, and head North to Dark Elf
city?

From East freport, out to the desert of North ro, through the tunnel there
into East commonlands. take the Casm into Nectulos forest, which will have a
tunnel into Neriak Foreign quarter, to Neriak Commons, To nerik Third Gate.

Sonoroud Tomebinder
